meta.title: Gangsta Duel - Enter the Ultimate Street Showdown
meta.description: Dive into the gritty world of Gangsta Duel – a fierce 2-player shooter where reflexes, tactics, and timing are your weapons to survive.

hero.title: Lock, Load, and Duel
hero.description: Step into Gangsta Duel – where every bullet counts and every move can be your last. Are you fast enough to survive the streets?

welcome.title: Welcome to Gangsta Duel
welcome.content:
Enter a brutal urban battlefield where every shot is do or die. Gangsta Duel is a high-stakes shooter that puts your reflexes and aim to the ultimate test.

Choose your gangster, grab your weapon, and face off in intense duels packed with adrenaline. With gritty pixel-art visuals and unpredictable action, Gangsta Duel brings classic street battles back in style.

🔫 Fierce Duels

Face your friend or the AI in fast-paced one-on-one shootouts where only the sharpest shooter survives.

🔥 Explosive Action

Dive into chaotic matches filled with bullets, power-ups, and explosive street warfare.

howToPlay.title: How to Duel
howToPlay.content:
🎯 Objective

Defeat your opponent in a series of fast-paced shootouts. First to win multiple rounds becomes the true street champion!

🎮 Controls

Player 1 and Player 2 have separate keys to move and shoot. Time your shots and dodge enemy fire to survive each round.

⏱️ Quick Reflexes

React fast and shoot first – even a moment of hesitation can cost you the round.

🏆 Scoring

Win rounds by eliminating your opponent. The more rounds you win, the closer you are to total domination.

rotationTactics.title: Duel Tactics
rotationTactics.content:
Sharpen your edge with these street-smart strategies:

🎯

Time Your Shots

Don’t just mash the trigger. Wait for the perfect moment to fire and land the hit.

🛡️

Use Cover

Hide behind objects to dodge enemy fire and surprise your opponent when they least expect it.

⚡

Strike Fast

Speed is survival. React quickly to your rival's moves to gain the upper hand.

🤜

Know Your Rival

Watch how your opponent plays and adapt your strategy to outgun them.

trapsTimers.title: Hazards & Chaos
trapsTimers.content:
The street doesn't play fair – stay sharp in every duel:

💣

Explosive Environments

Watch out for barrels and hazards that can turn the tide of battle instantly.

🔐

Limited Ammo

Make every bullet count – missing could leave you wide open.

🌀

Sudden Power-Ups

Keep an eye out for boosts that can change everything in a flash.

🚀

Random Chaos

Unpredictable events keep every duel fresh and intense. Stay ready for anything.

escapeChallenge.title: Street Challenge
escapeChallenge.content:
Think you're the fastest gun in the city? Prove it in Gangsta Duel – available right here in your browser.

Grab a friend or face off against the CPU and show everyone who really runs these streets.

reviews.name: Sarah Chen
reviews.text: Incredible fun! The 2-player mode is pure chaos and laughs. Me and my brother can't stop playing!

reviews.name: Marcus Rodriguez
reviews.text: Feels like an old-school arcade battle with modern twists. Every round is unpredictable and exciting.

reviews.name: Emma Thompson
reviews.text: Great duel mechanics and fast gameplay. It’s super competitive and really fun with friends.

reviews.name: David Kim
reviews.text: Pixel graphics + quickfire duels = perfect combo. Super satisfying every time I win a round.

reviews.name: Lisa Johnson
reviews.text: Love the pacing and intensity. Would be cool to see more characters or guns, but already very fun!

reviews.name: Alex Parker
reviews.text: Never thought I'd enjoy a 2D shooter this much. Totally addictive, especially in multiplayer.
